events.message: Received application from candidate John Doe for the Software Engineer position, including a detailed resume and cover letter showcasing relevant development experience.
Candidate John Doeâ€™s application has been categorized under Engineering due to extensive experience in software development and proven skills in backend systems.
Recruiter Sarah Smith has been assigned to follow up with John Doe and coordinate the next steps in the hiring process for the engineering role.
Conducted initial screening call with John Doe. Candidate demonstrated strong understanding of software architecture and demonstrated good communication skills.
Received positive response from John Doe confirming availability for technical interview next week and expressing excitement about the opportunity.
Scheduled a technical interview for John Doe on May 8th at 2 PM UTC with the senior developer team to assess coding and problem-solving skills.
